attributes.action: Cancel the £3,200 MP pay rise and use it to give all children free school meals
attributes.background: MPs should not be giving themselves a pay rise whilst denying free school meals for children this is disgusting behaviour and needs to end immediately.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for setting MPs' pay. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here: https://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Reform IPSA - cap MP payrises in line with other Public sector pay: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554400

End child food poverty – no child should be going hungry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554276
